html_code:
Cookies on the NHS website

We've put some small files called cookies on your device to make our site work.

We'd also like to use analytics cookies. These collect feedback and send information about how our site is used to services called Adobe Analytics, Qualtrics Feedback, Microsoft Clarity and Google Analytics. We use this information to improve our site.

Let us know if this is OK. We'll use a cookie to save your choice. You can read more about our cookies before you choose.
text:
Cookies on the NHS website
We've put some small files called cookies on your device to make our site work.
We'd also like to use analytics cookies. These collect feedback and send information about how our site is used to services called Adobe Analytics, Qualtrics Feedback, Microsoft Clarity and Google Analytics. We use this information to improve our site.
Let us know if this is OK. We'll use a cookie to save your choice. You can read more about our cookies before you choose.
I'm OK with analytics cookies Do not use analytics cookies
